article: All students  _  to have good study habits. When you have good study habits, you learn things  _  . You also remember  _  easily. Do you like to study  _  the living room? This is not a good place,  because  it is usually too noisy. You need to study in a quiet place, like your  bedroom  . A quiet place will help you only to think about  one thing  . When you study, do not think about  other  things at the same time. Only think about your homework. If you do this, you will do your homework  much more  quickly, and you will make  _  mistakes. Good study habits are very important. If you do not have them, try to learn them. If you are already good, try to make them better.
